summary: Retain you pretty look as Vampire
descriptionHtml:
[size=20]BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD, READ THE DESCRIPTION AND MAKE A BACKUP OF YOUR SAVEGAME[/size]

Why did you do this mod? Appearance
---------------------------------------
I do not really like to look ugly or have a face preset as Vampire, so i made this.

What does this mod do?
-------------------------------------
Exactly what it says, you stay pretty, changes your face to be pretty again after drinking from the \"Well of Age\" which you can find in the Volkihar Castle in Fura\'s room (see scrennshots).

[youtube]jJMQ2YGZJN8[/youtube]

How does it Work?
------------------------------
Activate the well in the room and you get three Choices, one is to get Young(your normal look) again, the other to get old(vampire look), the third option allows you to cancel the process, once you select an option you will get reverted to your base Race(if you are a NordRace you will be a NordRace again and not a NordRaceVampire), but you will still be able to do all the Vampire Quests from Harkon and his Court, even people will still comment on your pale skin, you will keep all vampire ability\'s too, and you can morph into a vampire lord and revert back to your pretty character.

Note!!!
-----------------
Make a backup of you savegame first, i did test this mod, but i did not test an entire playtrough nor the compatibility with other vampire mods, though my mod does not change any Vanilla scripts or quests the only vanilla thing that is changed was the Volkihar Castle, which contains the well.


Compatibility:
------------------------
This affects only Vanilla Races, because i guess Custom Races use their own Face gen anyway so i guess there is no need to add any custom race compatibility to this one.
author: Keldis
